venue.name: Days Hotel And Conference Center Methuen

item.description:
This event has just become a Triple Header!!!

SVCMD Andre' Vaughn and Dr Joel Wallach will be on hand for the morning business presentation, so get there early!!!  Dr Glidden will bring it home with the health lecture!!!

As an outspoken advocate of Wholistic Health, Dr. Glidden has lectured to thousands of people over the last 2 decades. He delivers over 60 plus health Lectures each year, and is a regular speaker at Health Freedom Expo & Youngevity Regional Meetings. He has appeared on TV, is a regular guest host of the “Dead Doctors Don’t Lie” Health Talk radio program, and gives free weekly seminars all over Chicagoland. His new book, The MD Emperor Has No Clothes, is an eye-opening, groundbreaking, jaw dropping exposition on the shortcomings of conventional MD directed medicine and the unrivaled excellence of Wholistic medical treatments.

To listen to Dr. Glidden's "Being Healthy is easy" visit https://traftonbernadette.wordpress.com/dr-peter-glidden-being-healthy-is-simple/ and listen for free.

The morning portion of the day will be an overview of Youngevity and our phenomenal opportunity, followed by Dr. Glidden's Health lecture.  Dr. Glidden will stay to answer your specific health questions after the seminar!

Contact Bernadette for your free ticket to this event!  dette101@gmail.com or 603-834-4587

group.name: Your Bridge to health and wealth

item.name: Triple Header - SVCMD Andre Vaughn, Dr Joel Wallach and Dr Peter Glidden
